summary: Iteration 9: All new features verified - Email/Password Login (replacing Google Auth), Ajax Keyword Search (replacing AI Search), User Management with Create User functionality. All 28 backend tests passed, Frontend UI fully functional.
critical_code_review_comments: Note: The sidebar menu still shows 'KI-Suche' text but it now uses keyword search instead of AI. Consider renaming to 'Suche' or 'Wissenssuche' for clarity.

test_credentials.note: Test users prefixed with TEST_iter9_ were cleaned up after tests

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 9 features all working correctly. Google Auth has been replaced with classic email/password login. AI/Pinecone search has been replaced with MongoDB regex keyword search. User management allows admins to create new users with password.

login_endpoint.notes: Accepts email, password, stay_logged_in. Returns user data and sets session cookie.

logout_endpoint.notes: Clears session cookie and invalidates session

create_user_endpoint.notes: Admin only. Creates user with email, password, name, role.

change_password_endpoint.notes: Admin only. Changes user password (min 6 chars) and invalidates all sessions.

keyword_search_endpoint.notes: Searches articles by title, content, summary, tags using MongoDB regex. Returns scored results.

quick_search_endpoint.notes: Fast autocomplete search on title and summary only. 300ms debounce on frontend.

frontend_login_page.notes: Clean login form with email, password inputs and stay_logged_in checkbox. All data-testids present.

frontend_search_page.notes: Live search with 300ms debounce. Shows results with highlighting, category, date, status badges.

frontend_user_management.notes: 'Neuer Benutzer' button opens dialog with Name, Email, Password, Role fields. Password change dialog also available.

api_tests_performed.auth_login_success: POST /api/auth/login with valid credentials returns 200 with user data
api_tests_performed.auth_login_stay_logged_in: POST /api/auth/login with stay_logged_in=true sets longer session
api_tests_performed.auth_me_authenticated: GET /api/auth/me with session returns user data
api_tests_performed.users_create_success: POST /api/users as admin creates new user
api_tests_performed.search_basic: POST /api/search with query returns scored results
api_tests_performed.search_empty: POST /api/search with empty query returns empty results
api_tests_performed.search_short: POST /api/search with 1 char returns empty results
api_tests_performed.get_all_users: GET /api/users returns user list without password_hash
api_tests_performed.create_and_login: Full workflow: create user -> login with new user works
api_tests_performed.search_workflow: Full workflow: create article -> search finds it

ui_tests_performed.login_page: Login page loads with all form elements (data-testid attributes present)
ui_tests_performed.login_flow: Enter credentials -> click login -> redirects to dashboard with success toast
ui_tests_performed.search_page: Search page loads with input, initial state, and placeholder text
ui_tests_performed.search_debounce: Type query -> 300ms wait -> results appear with highlighting
ui_tests_performed.user_management_page: User table loads with all users, role badges, action buttons
ui_tests_performed.create_user_dialog: Neuer Benutzer button opens dialog with Name, Email, Password, Role fields
